Key Match Events: Taskin Ahmed was named Player of the Match for his performance of 3/19.
Sean Williams scored 64 off 42 balls for Zimbabwe.
Mosaddek Hossain took 2 crucial wickets in the final over.
Richard Ngarava hit a six but was stumped on the next ball.
Brad Evans was caught by Afif Hossain off Mosaddek Hossain.
Zimbabwe needed 16 runs from the final over but fell short by 3 runs.
Post-Match Reflections: Taskin Ahmed expressed excitement and exhaustion, mentioning the nervousness and the good match.
Taskin Ahmed highlighted the support from Allan Donald and other staff in improving their fast-bowling.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match featured a dramatic final over with a no-ball and a free hit.
Bangladesh's wicketkeeper Nurul Hasan made an error that gave Zimbabwe a free hit off the final ball.
Zimbabwe's Sean Williams was Cricinfo's MVP with 122.57 points.
